summary:
Team player and Innovator, I consider myself an agile profile, able to move, thrive and succeed through stressful situations while pushing the boundaries of my comfort zone. 

Thanks to my recent background, I’m used to managing large-scale and international projects, collaborating among different teams such as Service & Experience design, Product, UX and Strategy teams. 

Experienced in facilitating creative and problem-solving sessions, conducting research from various angles and fields and framing design challenges and opportunities. With a can-do attitude and a pragmatic mindset, I enjoy visualising the end goal, mapping out the steps to reach it and defining outcomes such as Blueprints, Customer Journeys & Experience Maps, user flows or Process Diagrams, that align with business objectives and customer needs.

I take enjoyment from working aside with other colleagues & designers on projects from an end-to-end perspective, allowing me to deep-dive into a topic. 
Ideate and design great ideas, validate them through data-driven processes, deliver service and experiences, bring them to life, and follow them to keep improving the experience.

Customer-centric oriented whilst making people's lives easier/simpler and more exciting.

projects.title: Pamplona Innovaction Week
projects.description:
El mayor evento sobre Innovación en Pamplona de los últimos años con profesionales del sector como Tom Kelly o Risto Megide.
Durante una semana participamos activamente en la realización de Pamplona Innovaction Week, dinamizando un equipo de 20 personas en el desarrollo de actividades de Networking en la feria del evento.

projects.title: MTORRES. Innovación en Herramientas de Comunicación
projects.description:
Durante 4 meses desarrollamos conjuntamente con Mtorres las herramientas de comunicación que utilizarán los próximos años (catálogos, presentaciones, videos y materiales físicos).

En una primera fase, analizamos tanto la competencia como sectores de interés para obtener las mejores ideas y lineas a seguir de los materiales.

En la segunda fase, ideamos prototipos adaptables a Mtorres y sus necesidades, validándolos con el cliente para finalmente pasar a producción final.

projects.title: STARTCOOP: COOP EVENT ON SAN FRANCISCO (USA)
projects.description:
An amazing event about the worker-owned businesses that are transforming the Bay Area. Rainbow Grocery Store, Arizmendi Bakery or The Cheese Board Collective are some of the co-ops that have been working as models for a new economy since the mid 70’s, gaining respect day after day through their extraordinary work as platforms for social innovation.

The event was set up in partnership with Impact Hub, Mondragon University and Angeles Arrien Foundation. 

The event was opened by Ph.D. Angeles Arrien, cultural anthropologist, award-winning author, educator and consultant to many organizations and businesses. During her life she has focused her work on values and beliefs shared by humanity across cultures, and having worked with leaders as Mijail Gorbachov she will be sharing how people have been working together across cultures in the past and how these learnings could be applied into the business context of these days. 

After the speech we have the panel of some people that are also working in the area of worker owned business: Rainbow Grocery, Sustainable Economies Law Center and Georgia Kelly from Praxis Peace Institute.
Finally we closed the event with a space for sharing and combining opinions between the assistants.

profile_positions.description:
As Customer Experience & Service Designers, we are driving user research, insights, market trends & experience design best practices, to shape the strategy and design for ground-breaking customer propositions. 

We empathise with customers and understand their needs, motivations, and individual contexts. We zoom through different layers of detail and complexity, from looking at the end-to-end customer journey, to diving into specific micro-interactions. As a whole, our focus is on optimising all customer-brand interactions and touch-points to create relevant, satisfying, and compelling experiences for the customer, and nurture a strong customer-brand bond.

We are responsible for developing and implementing ground-breaking customer propositions:
· Analyse markets and brand performance. 
· Design new products, brands, services, processes, and experiences that drive value for the customer and business. 
· Articulate all necessary visual deliverables to explain and communicate those services, experiences and products throughout the whole organisation (Prototypes, Blueprints, Experience & Customer Journey maps, User Flows, Customer Stories, Process Maps etc...).
· Review existing business models, as more services move online and cross-channel. 
· Be open to proposing new business models – as we balance profitability with sustainability. 
· Identify and develop market trial roadmaps (service delivery and service impact). 
· Work alongside brand, product, UX & Strategy teams in a consultant role, with a conscious approach to knowledge transfer.
· Iterate, validate and iterate again.

profile_positions.description:
As an account executive in LOLA, I’ve been moving through different Global accounts as Cornetto, Paddle Pop, Pescanova and Scrabble, helping whenever it was necessary, especially during productions and campaigns.

🍦Cornetto Ice Creams (Unilever)
I’ve been working for Global Cornetto, getting involved in new “Don’t Try Too Hard” platform, developing several audiovisual campaigns (6 TV Commercials), Youtube Bumper Ads and different market adaptations.
My roll has been really executional, helping my Account Manager and Director running the daily work of the account and managing the daily relationship with the customer. It has given me the opportunity to create a big picture of a Global great consumption brand, learning how a huge advertising campaign is managed from tip to toe.
 
My main responsibilities are:
📌Manage daily request from Global customer
📌Manage relationship with providers
📌Manage films Post-productions and adaptations
📌Manage Product Sequence developments
📌New Business initial launching
